metadata.name: No. 2024 v.7
metadata.description:
Algorithmic painting  
4k resolution  
2021

The gradient is a powerful metaphor of human beings in Web3, blurring boundaries and uniting diverse colors. It represents an ethos driven by freedom, innovation, co-creation and collaborationâ€”all equally essential components in crafting the Metaverse that will shape our future. NFTs are embracing trustless systems to create decentralized networks from which holistic revolutions can emerge; meanwhile, we as citizens must go beyond traditional rigid beliefs to celebrate openness across race, nationality, sexuality politics, etc., understanding how together we form the beautiful spectrum of humanity -the Gradient. We have the opportunity not only to build a new civilization but also one full of beauty: let us start with creating harmony within ourselves through creative expression in Web3.
